Home.Banner-Paragraph: GraduateGateway is a team based project intended to prepare students for the MOE Exit Exam.
Home.Description-Paragraph: Graduate Gateway has collaborated with Mekelle University and uses Ministry of Education Ethiopia as a reference for all the Exams provided in this Website.

About-us.Banner-Paragraph: GraduateGateway is a team based project intended to prepare students for the MOE Exit Exam.
About-us.Description-Paragraph-1: We provide a centralized location for study materials including past exam papers and practice questions.
About-us.Description-Paragraph-2: Facilitate full-length mock exams that simulate the actual testing environment to help users become familiar with the exam format and time constraints.

Contact.Banner-Title: We would love to hear from you.

FAQ.Title: FAQs
FAQ.answer1: You go to the homepage, scroll down to the bottom and tab Register. Then all you have to do is fill out the form
FAQ.question2: How do I take the exams?
FAQ.answer2: On the home page, you'll find the menu for Exams. Once you go to Exams, Choose your field and continue doing the exams.
FAQ.question3: How do I know the grade of the exam?
FAQ.answer3: Once you finish the exam, the grade will be shown on the screen.
FAQ.question4: How can I modify my account?
FAQ.answer4: On the home page, you can click on your profile name, and there you can find your name, email and field of study. You can modify them there and once you are done, click the Update profile button.
FAQ.answer5: Yes, there's a tutorial button on the home page where you can get various resources. Look for what you want and you can download them for offline uses.
FAQ.question6: How can I delete my account?
FAQ.answer6: If you want to delete your account, first you have to contact the admin. If the admin allows it, it'll be deleted.
